decks.notes: The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a big swing with cards like Animate Dead and Archon of Cruelty. It also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to control the game and protect the combo. The main strategy is to outpace and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats early in the game, while also having some flexibility with cards like Brazen Borrower for additional utility.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently generate mana and card advantage in order to storm off and cast multiple spells in a single turn to win the game. The deck utilizes a variety of fast mana sources and cantrips to enable explosive turns, while also utilizing graveyard recursion with cards like Echo of Eons and Entomb. By chaining together spells and generating storm count, the deck aims to cast a lethal Tendrils of Agony to finish off the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly apply pressure to the opponent through aggressive creatures like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler while utilizing efficient removal and counterspells to control the game. The deck aims to maintain tempo by using cards like Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base and keep them on the back foot. By utilizing a mix of threats and disruption, the deck aims to close out games quickly and efficiently, punishing any missteps from the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures while maintaining control of the board with powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and The One Ring. The deck also utilizes mana acceleration through cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide to quickly play out threats. The inclusion of cards like Cavern of Souls and Boseiju, Who Endures allows for protection against counterspells and removal spells, ensuring that the player's creatures are able to connect and deal damage efficiently. The deck aims to win the game quickly through early aggression and maintaining tempo.

This deck revolves around assembling and utilizing the Mystic Forge combo to generate powerful synergies and advantages. By combining artifact ramp and untap effects with Mystic Forge's ability to cast artifacts from the top of the library, the deck aims to generate mana and card advantage to overwhelm opponents. Utilizing cards like Grim Monolith, Lotus Petal, and Urza's Saga, along with key pieces like Glaring Fleshraker and Planar Nexus, the deck can quickly create overwhelming board states and outpace opponents. With support from Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, Eye of the Storms, this combo-heavy deck can quickly establish dominance on the battlefield.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the necessary combo pieces to cast powerful spells like Necrodominance and Soul Spike. The strategy revolves around using cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal to generate mana fast, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress. The key combo pieces include The One Ring and March of Wretched Sorrow, along with strong creatures like Dauthi Voidwalker and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse to maintain board presence. With efficient resource management and strategic card play, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on using spells like Entomb and Reanimate to quickly bring powerful creatures back from the graveyard, such as Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect the combo. The deck also features card draw and selection with Brainstorm and Ponder, as well as countermagic with Daze. The mana base includes fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors. Overall, the deck aims to quickly reanimate threats and disrupt opponents' game plans.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with key creatures using spells like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield for a powerful combo finish. It utilizes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to protect its game plan, while also having versatile threats like Murktide Regent and Brazen Borrower to apply pressure. The deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver opponents by combining powerful reanimation spells with efficient card draw and disruption, creating a fast and explosive gameplay style.

This deck focuses on quickly putting powerful creatures into play from the graveyard using cards like Reanimate and Animate Dead. By combining strong creatures like Murktide Regent, Archon of Cruelty, and Atraxa, Grand Unifier with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent while controlling the game with Wasteland and Fatal Push. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Entomb provide additional support and card advantage, while cards like Brainstorm and Ponder help to find key combo pieces efficiently.

This deck focuses on playing cheap and efficient spells to control the board and pressure the opponent's life total. It combines card advantage and tempo plays to stay ahead of the opponent and disrupt their game plan. By utilizing powerful threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Murktide Regent, along with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to keep the opponent on the back foot while pushing through damage quickly. The mana base is streamlined for consistency and to support its low mana cost spells and aggressive game plan.
